title: Final Days of Sharon Tate (Documentary, Biography)

sources.title: Final Days of Sharon Tate (Documentary, Biography)
sources.description:
The documentary profiled the final and last days of Sharon Tate Polanski, a beloved actress and model, who was killed in 1969 by a cult in Los Angeles, California. She was eight months pregnant with her son at the time of her murder.


00:00 Full Documentary ( with Spanish audio & many Subtitles)
01:00  Tragic murder of Hollywood actress Sharon Tate and four others in a ritualistic mass murder.
07:56 Intimate insights into Sharon Tate's whirlwind marriage to Roman Polanski and their glamorous lifestyle.
13:26 Tragic events lead to Sharon Tate's return to Los Angeles, marking a moment of peace and family reunion.
19:14 Manson's twisted ideology leads followers to commit murders in hopes of inciting a race war.
26:04 Tragic events unfold as a group of individuals target a residence, driven by jealousy and disregard for its occupants.
32:24 Police officers respond to a distress call and discover multiple deceased bodies in a house.
37:25 Tragic events unfold as Charles Manson's killing spree shocks the world, leading to devastating consequences for Roman Polanski.
42:45 Media portrayal of lifestyle, murder investigation delays, breakthrough at Barker Ranch.
47:55 Impact of Manson on hippie movement and murder convictions leading to commuted sentences.
